text: ayane akasalanu mariyu bhumini aru dinamulalo (ayyam lalo) srstincina vadu, taruvata ayana sinhasananni (ars nu) adhistincadu. Bhumiloki poyedi mariyu dani nundi bayatiki vaccedi mariyu akasam nundi digedi mariyu daniloki ekkedi anta ayanaku telusu. Mariyu mirekkadunna ayana mito patu untadu mariyu allah miru cesedanta custunnadu
